item.description:
I would like to have a bbq at my house in Hamden. I would ask that people bring appetizers and side dishes. Also please bring any alcohol you would like to drink. I will provide hambergers, hot dogs, paper plates, cups, etc. and of course my home. I will also provide desserts too!!!

Hope to see everyone at my house on Saturday, Oct. 3rd at 2 pm. Thanks.

Antoinette

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Party Express BBQ
